Do you believe player X ? // Layout : fourth_step Player Player Y doesn't believe you, Pick your right card ! // Layout : rule_page 	Welcome to the pyramid ! This game is a drinking game.

	During the fourth firsts tours cards will be dealt to each player by asking simple question about their types. When each player has 4 cards in hands, they have to remember their values in order.

	The pyramid now begins, it has 5 levels corresponding to the sips to give. For each card, each player can give drinks at one player. This player will have to trust the giver or to ask him/her to reveal the card concerned for twice the sips.

									 Enjoy !
